special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation.
descriptions: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost
* 1st level (4 slots): charm person, detect magic, sleep
* 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, hold person
* 3rd level (3 slots): lightning bolt, water breathing

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
